name: Funny Fruit Animal Edition
description:
Funny Fruit Animal Edition is match-3 puzzle game!
New fruits, new items, new elements, new excitement!
Features:
● Endless fun for all ages
● Over 200 addictive levels
● Many powerful items to help you win levels
● Different obstacles in the levels to make the game hard to beat
● Juicy fruits, cute graphics, and cool animation effects
